title: Things fall apart
author: 64a3141913f4871c2eb50575
summary: The novel follows the life of Okonkwo, an igbo man and local wrestling champion in the fictional Nigerian clan of Umofia.

title: The Lion and the jewel
author: 64a3141913f4871c2eb50576
summary: The lion and the jewel chronicles how Baroka, the lion, fights with modern Lakunle over the right to marry Sidi, the titular jewel
